title: Synthesis and characterization of micro-/nano-α-Fe2O3 for photocatalytic dye degradation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29099-29105
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04575K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vikram Rama Uttam Pandit, Ganesh Kavita Parshuram Jadhav, Vivekanand Mangal Sakharam Jawale, Rohit Dubepatil, Rajendra Gurao, Dattatray J. Late
Photocatalytic activity using micro-/nano-α-Fe2O3 on a large scale was carried out using a sol–gel autocombustion method.
